Plot: When Poppy finds a postcard from Paris, sent by an aunt she didn't know existed, she books a flight to France to investigate. Just days after arriving in Paris, she accidentally lands herself a job thanks to a case of mistaken identity. To complicate matters further, she soon starts to fall for her new boss. Falling in love with your boss is never a good idea and she knows it. But when he makes her an offer she can't refuse, her heart just might win the battle against reason and logic.
